website_summaries.verdict: A tough, versatile boot for all jobs.
pros: Not only are these attractive boots tough, but they're also comfortable and don't take long to break in
If you need to be on your feet for long stretches, go with these
cons: These aren't quite as durable as other Caterpillar boots

customer_reviews.title: Where the ankle met the sole...there was a ridge that bothered my feet
customer_reviews.text: Fit size wise was acurate, but the portion of the boot where the ankle met the sole has a ridge to it. I could tell this would really bother my feet in a short time. I still purchased CAT boots from amazon, just a different style. I went with (Caterpillar Men's Excavator 8 Inch WP FF Work Boot,Dark Brown,12 M US) - and I love them - been wearing for approx 3 months...fit great....didn't bother my feet at all...even when breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Squires

customer_reviews.title: Endure Super Duty
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Cat Endure Super Duty boots on January and I use them to work in a mining and they face rain, dust or rocks every day. From monday to sunday. And they remains perfect. Soft inside, just a little bit heavy, but perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Luciano de Oliveira Lazaro

customer_reviews.title: Best boots EVER
customer_reviews.text: My only boots. I have a set for every task. I'm a master welder, master mechanic, and drive my concrete trucks when needed. The colts for welding, my Alaskans for the truck shop, and the Endure Super Duty's for my heavy fabrication jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G.

customer_reviews.title: It's very comfortable but more of a inside plant shoe not for ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very comfortable but more of a inside plant shoe not for anyone outside in heavy construction choose the cat Alaska for quality and price
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: great work shoes
customer_reviews.text: these shoes were ordered for my brother and he couldn't be more happy with them. these are his work shoes that he where all day at different construction sites, he loves how strong and comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Sayers

customer_reviews.title: Fair boots
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these boots for almost 6 months now and it's showing a lot of wear. And I'm not in construction. There are two places where the material is starting to weaken and crack, and as I said, these aren't being worn unnecessarily rough. They are comfortable, but the quality of materials and/or construction at this point is no more than acceptable. I would have liked them to have been put together a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of money but solid.
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy buts it's cause of the steel toe. Well made and bult to last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon A+
customer_reviews.text: These boots are most comfortable boots. Cheapest price by quite a bit. Actually if I Would of waited till 11/26/15 would of been $94.00 total compared to farm n fleet for Same boot total around $132.00
customer_reviews.author: Clev Family

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Buy good insoles with these and you will be able to wear these until the soles wear off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Been using Cat boots for years at work. Great quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: David P Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair in the month of March
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived ahead of schedule and this is my second pair bought this month. I bought the low top steel toe boots earlier this month and was so impressed I bought a second pair for the quality. Boot pair of boots feel great on my feet. I love the quality and feel of the CAT.
customer_reviews.author: Halloran

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots that fit well and perform great especially after ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots that fit well and perform great especially after the break-in period. I purchased the black Waterproof version as well, both from Amazon, but wait for the under $99 deals.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Performance
customer_reviews.text: This boot is perfection. It is comfortable, durable and looks good. The provider is known for quality and this product did not disappoint. THe cushioning makes the experience a comforting one.
customer_reviews.author: hammer@5555

customer_reviews.title: Best boots I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I have ever purchased. I have an old pair of boots that cost me $200 and these are higher quality than the old pair.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat cats
customer_reviews.text: As an Industrial Electrician the choice of foot wear is important, For hard wearing and comfort you cant beat cats .Cats are with out a doubt the longest lasting and hardest wearing boot on the nz market for me the is no equal
customer_reviews.author: johnnymachine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying these for years. Will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Moncrief

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: From the first day I put these on I have hated them. Very uncomfortable. Feels like im standing on a brick. I even put some new insoles in and still cant stand them. They just dont seem to fit right. I also hate how the tongue has no padding, I can feel the laces when bending down. My last boot was a Dr. Marten Ironbridge. Most comfortable boot I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Luvnugz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! These are the best boots I've had yet. They are so comfortable and they have better arch support then my expensive tennis shoes. Great product and I would recommend to anyone who works hard like I do and who is on their feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband LOVES these boots
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these boots. He has used them since we bought them for work and we have bought several different pairs of boots since, but he always goes back to these. He can't seem to find another boot that is as comfortable and suits his work hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have been perfect if they weren't so inadequately large comparing to the specified size and width. I bought 9 M US, but it can easily fit 9.5 and I suspect even 10.
customer_reviews.author: D. Barbakadze

customer_reviews.title: The laces are usual crap from caterpillar,and the toe of the boot is abysmal
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even last 2 months,arrived on 8 September didn’t wear until a week later and am having to look for a new pair of boots already pure garbage
customer_reviews.author: Tony o Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: these boots are great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is on his feet 13 hours a day, these boots are great!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Very nice workboots. I knew
customer_reviews.text: Very nice workboots. I knew, by reading the reviews that they fit a little big so I ordered them half size smaller. I am 9 1/2 and ordered them 9

customer_reviews.title: Good boots for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good boots this is the 3rd pair so we like them. they last about 10 months.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, second pair. Fit great and very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Morgan

customer_reviews.title: But one broken in they are the most comfortable boots I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to break in. But one broken in they are the most comfortable boots I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Barney A. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I usually need to break boots in for comfort. These were very comfortable right out of the box. Great insole as a part of boot, where I usually need to buy better insoles sepetately than what my boots come with.

customer_reviews.title: Caterpillar Endure Review
customer_reviews.text: Good boots, a few complaints though, they should have a rubber coating on the toe of the boot, they wear very easily when kneeling on concrete. Also the insole they come with sucks, its very thin, not good for a work boot in this price range. Other than that, excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Damo from Australia

customer_reviews.title: Caterpillar Boot are great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Caterpillar boots are very comfortable. Boots are good quality, sturdy and heavy. Boots that will last a long long time. Very Happy Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Skin10

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional service
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and on time. The boot is great and very comfortable, and very beautiful. The quality seems good, the kind that will last many years. Highly recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Vieira

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots for Working in construction etc.
customer_reviews.text: Great nice shoes w/ style. STEEL TOE w/ soft shoesole. If you have a WIDE foot, this will be a good boots for u.Just choose "W" on the shoesize when purchasing. i can stand for the who;e 8 hour shift & doesnt feel tired at all.

customer_reviews.title: caterpillar boots
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I go to many different work sites and they are ideal for all guranteeing safety and comfort. I would reccomend them to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: ... 15 years and they are by far the most comfortable boots to work in
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing cat boots for 15 years and they are by far the most comfortable boots to work in

customer_reviews.title: Good boots for bigger foot guys
customer_reviews.text: These boots are really good at wear over time. They do have one defect which caused the need to replace them. The back of boot by heel over time seperates from sole and can not be fixed. Did last for 1 year before needed replacement.

customer_reviews.title: congratulations

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Verry nice looking and confortable, the proble, is the weight
customer_reviews.text: Verry nice looking and confortable, ,,,I recommend to buy a half size less,,,its not for walking diary ,,,is for job,,,

customer_reviews.title: Great boot.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boot. Looks to be another great boot from Caterpillar. Plenty of room for the toes under the steel toe, especially if you order the wide instead of regular.

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Item received before estimated delivery date and boots fit perfectly, exactly as I had hoped for.

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof. uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof. uncomfortable. do not recommend these boots. nice look but not worth it, unless your using them as a fashion statement, say maybe your lady ga-ga doing a show.

customer_reviews.title: HAS NOT SHOW UP YET
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots on nov 25 2013 and the expected delivery date is nov 27 and I waited paciently but now its just ridiculous.. it is 12/4/2013 and they have yet to come.. will never order from cat ever again..
customer_reviews.author: nick

product_meta.title: Caterpillar Men's Endure Super Duty 6" Steel Lace to Toe Boot
product_meta.description:
Guys looking for a boot with added oomph will appreciate this hardworking pair from Caterpillar. Built with an extra-tough full-grain leather upper, the Endure features a welted construction for durability and comfort, a protective steel toe, and a generously padded collar and tongue for ankle support. The boot is equipped with Caterpillar's signature non-slip rubber sole and comes with a removable anti-microbial insole to keep feet feeling dry and fresh.

As the world's foremost manufacturer of heavy equipment, Cat earthmovers are known around the world as a symbol of honest work, strength and integrity. Cat Footwear makes boots and shoes based on these same principals. The brand has evolved from work boots into a range of industrial and casual footwear built with the sole purpose of staying true to their original goal--creating genuine, hard-working boots and shoes.
feature_bullets: Proprietary iTechnology construction for superior durability and comfort
